DataElement.preferredDefinition: A label describing the kind of variation in exposure used for the purpose of limiting the dose.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDS Example
ReferenceDocuments.description:
NONE
ANGULAR = current is modulated over different tube angles
LONGITUDINAL = current is modulated along the axis of the table
ECG_BASED = current is modulated based on the cardiac phase
ORGAN_BASED = current is modulated based on the organs in the field of view

DataElement.administrativeNotes: 2/5/24 Addef Ref doc CDS Example. BF;11/22/2023 created for CDS Imaging template. BF
